Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Pharmacologic Substance/Biological Response Modifier/Vaccine/Recombinant Viral Vaccine/Vaccinia Vaccine/Recombinant Vaccinia-Prostate Specific Antigen
Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: A recombinant vaccinia virus encoding prostate-specific antigen (PSA). Vaccination with recombinant vaccinia-PSA may stimulate the host immune system to mount a cytotoxic T lymphocyte (CTL) response against tumor cells positive for PSA, which may decrease tumor growth. (NCI04)
